root.name: Eagle Eye Mysteries in London
root.description: In Eagle Eye Mysteries, the player plays an American boy who visits London and becomes involved in solving numerous mysteries and cases. Unlike other adventure games, Eagle Eye Mysteries features manyÂ chapters which are all concluded cases. Players can travel all over a London via a map of the city and search for clues and information. All the cases are related to various aspects of British Culture, be it fictional characters, geographical landmarks, history, habits and so forth.
